TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Record activity. Record is a basic rich-media capture activity
TutoPhotoContent: Click here to start taking a photo. The photo will be taken in 3 seconds. Smile!
TutoVideoContent: Click here to start taking a video. The capture will start immediately and for up to 5 seconds
TutoAudioContent: Click here to start recording the sound from your microphone. The capture will start immediately and for up to 5 seconds
